summary: This mod completely overhalls the sword Chillrend to make it actually live up to it\'s name. Also, the sword\'s weight stays static and doesn\'t increase as the sword levels up. After all, why should the weight of a weapon increase as it gets better?
descriptionHtml:
CHILLREND OVERHALL

This mod completely overhalls the sword Chillrend to make it actually live up to it\'s name. Also, the swords weight stays static and doesn\'t increase as the sword levels up. After all, why should the weight of a weapon increase as it gets better? 


===Base Item Stats===

Charge: 1000 (double the original stat)

Damage: 15 (doesn\'t change as the item levels up)

Weight: 11 (doesn\'t change as the item levels up)

Frost Damage: 15 (increases by 5 with item level up for a max of 40)

===Install===

Place the .esp file into your Skyrim Data folder.

===Uninstall===

Delete the .esp file from your Skyrim Data folder.
author: shadow5973
